definition: this is no small thing (idiom)/to have a serious matter at hand
see 茲事體大|兹事体大[zi1 shi4 ti3 da4]
see 茲事體大|兹事体大[zi1 shi4 ti3 da4]
military sports/military fitness (curriculum etc)/abbr. to 軍體|军体

sentences.english: Your imagery typically appears to be particularly narrative based.
sentences.chinese: 你的圖像典型的表現出特別依託於敘事體。

sentences.english: I know the satuation and what's going on with them.
sentences.chinese: 我知道這是咋一回事體，也知道他們到底怎麼了。

sentences.english: July 23 Suffering has nothing to do with events, but with one’s reaction to them.
sentences.chinese: 煎熬與事體無關，但關乎人之反應。

sentences.english: The pa per here discusses the contents and methods of army PE teaching.
sentences.chinese: 本文對軍事體育中素質的方法和內容進行了討論。
